lines:
s. S. K.--2

able to give him.

Our boys won their annual track meet with Exeter last Saturday 
by a score of 85 to 4, and the customary celebration followed. This coming 
Saturday se shall be in the stress of the baseball contest, where I en afraid 
our prospects of victory are not so good. The following week will find us 
passing through the excitement of commencement and the granulation festivities:

then the College Board's and the long suite vacation ahead.

These seasons

come around so fast as one grove older that it is hard to realize where a full

year yes to.

Please remember me most ally to any of my old friends whose 
trails you may happen to cross, and believe me with the old-time good will and

earliest good wishes

Iver sincerely yours,

ASSIG

This coming  Saturday se shall be in the stress of the baseball contest, where I en afraid  our prospects of victory are not so good. The following week will find us  passing through the excitement of commencement and the granulation festivities:  then the College Board's and the long suite vacation ahead.  These seasons  come around so fast as one grove older that it is hard to realize where a full  year yes to.  Please remember me most ally to any of my old friends whose  trails you may happen to cross, and believe me with the old-time good will and  earliest good wishes  Iver sincerely yours,  ASSIG

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter to Sung Sing Kwan to Alfred E. Stearns about the significance of the long form scroll given by Kwan to Stearns. Offer to introduce Henry Stimson to Kwan if Stimson travels to China (Page 1).
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
